sense.name: reach a destination or goal
sense.commentary: Syntax: NP1 ARRIVE (PP) Includes: ARRIVE AT NOTE: Includes animate or inanimate subjects.
sense.examples: On Mondays that train arrives at seven. Wednesday arrived before we knew it. With John's brilliant best-seller I would say he has arrived. She is arriving at the same conclusion. I wish they would arrive on time just once. Two packages arrived yesterday.
